dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information necessary to process your orders and improve your experience, including name, RUT (Tax ID), email, shipping address, and billing details.

dataUse.title: Use of Information
dataUse.content: We use your data to process purchases, manage shipments, accumulate points in your account, and, if authorized, send you personalized offers.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use cookies to remember your preferences, keep your session active, and analyze site traffic to improve our platform.

thirdParties.title: Third Parties and Security
thirdParties.content: We share strictly necessary data with payment processors (Flow) and logistics services (Chilexpress, Blue Express) to complete your order.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You can request access, rectification, or deletion of your personal data at any time through your account panel or by contacting us directly.

acceptance.title: Acceptance
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions of service.

purchases.title: Purchases and Payments
purchases.content: All transactions are processed securely. Prices are in Chilean Pesos (CLP) and include VAT where applicable.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: We ship throughout Chile through certified logistics operators. Delivery times vary by region and are reported at checkout.

returns.title: Returns
returns.content: You have 10 days to withdraw from your purchase and 90 days of legal guarantee for manufacturing defects, provided the product is sealed and in its original packaging.

loyalty.title: Calmar Points
loyalty.content: Our loyalty program allows you to accumulate points for each purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts on future orders according to current rates.
